<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs=""
>
[Clockwork Reanimator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3645) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Clockwork Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=184)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You can animate corpses through cunning engineering. You gain a [prototype construct companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=1600) to serve as a minion. Unlike normal construct companions, yours is a corpse animated by clockwork gears and technological prowess.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the clockwork reanimator archetype. If you retrain out of this feat, you lose the rituals learned from it.

<title level="2">Clockwork Reanimator Dedication leads to...</title>
[Advanced Reanimated Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3646), [Hijack Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=3647), [Improved Hijack Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=3651), [It's Alive!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3648), [Self-Destruct](/Feats.aspx?ID=3650), [Unwind Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3653), [Zombie Horde](/Feats.aspx?ID=3654)
